  • Method Details

    • createReview

      public void createReview(int answerId, String reviewer, String text, int weightage) throws ValidationException
      Creates a new review and attempts to save it to the database.
      Parameters:
      answerId - ID of the answer being reviewed
      reviewer - the reviewer of the answer
      text - the text of the review
      weightage - the weightage of the review
      previousReviewId - the ID of the previous review
      Throws:
      ValidationException

    • getReviewsForAnswer

      public List<Review> getReviewsForAnswer(int answerId)
      Returns the ArrayList of reviews for an answer.
      Parameters:
      answerId - the ID of the answer to get the review ArrayList for
      Returns:
      reviews the ArrayList of reviews for the answer

    • updateReview

      public boolean updateReview(int id, String newText, int weightage) throws ValidationException
      Updates a review and attempts to save it to the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to be updated
      newText - the new text to update the review to
      weightage - the weightage of the updated review
      Throws:
      ValidationException

    • voteReview

      public void voteReview(int reviewId, String studentId, boolean upvote)
      Allows the student to up vote a review, which updates its weightage
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review
      studentId - the ID of the student
      upvote - true for up voted, false for down voted

    • getReviewVotes

      public int getReviewVotes(int reviewId)
      Gets the votes of a review
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review
      Returns:
      the votes
